summary.para: The state of the metadata object.

remarks.para: The following diagram illustrates the functions that cause state transitions in the metadata object.

.:image type="content" source="./images/MetadataStates.png" border="false" alt-text="Diagram of the state transitions for a Metadata object showing the functions that cause transitions between the Created, Faulted, and Resolved states.".:

summary.para: The initial state of the metadata object.
All references between metadata documents have been resolved and no more metadata documents may be added to the metadata object. See for more information.
The metadata object not usable due to a previous error. See See and for more information.
